title: Rutabaga Mercenary

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a target to guard each night. You'll protect them with Basic defence, but attack both their closest neighbours, taking dead players into account.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Once per game, you may select yourself.

desc:
Post 3441
*The last thing they'll see is my rutabaga.*
Basic/None
